appDesc.message: Download videos from web sites or just collect them in your video list without downloading them.

idYT.message:
Note: Chrome Web Store does not allow extensions that download videos from YouTube any longer.

Click here to find more information

idYT3.message: Note: Chrome Web Store does not allow extensions that download videos from YouTube any longer. Click to get more information

idwait1.message: Waiting for the video server is answering

idcc.message: Send this video to your Google chromecast to play it on your TV

idnovideo1.message: No video found on this page

idnovideo2.message:
Did you try to start playback? Some sites required you to play the video before it can be downloaded.

Some video sites try to make it harder to download the video. If you want us to try to find a way for this page, submit this URL to us.

idnovideo3.message: Thank you, we will give our best to support this site, too!

idcc1.message: You need to install the Google chromecast extension in order to enable the cast feature in Video Downloader professional. Do you want to install this extension now?

idcc2.message: You need to enable the chromecast extension in order to enable the cast feature in Video Downloader professional. Do you want to enable the chromecast extension now?

idreview.message: You have downloaded multiple videos with Video Downloader professional. Please share your experience with others and make a review for us.

idadded2.message: has been added to the video list

idbegin.message: Move Top Link to the beginning

idend.message: Move Top Link to the end

searchurl2.message: Use %P1% as placeholder for the text to search for

resethelp2.message: Do you reallay want to reset all settings ?

langKey_helpedit.message: To move, delete or edit Top Links click 'Edit Top Links'

langKey_helpslideshow.message: To control background images you can hide the Top Links by this button:

langKey_helpsearch.message: The most important searches allways available: Enter your search word and click for instance on images

langKey_helpsettings.message: Click settings to customize the design of Startpage24

langKey_helpvideo.message: To add items into your video list play a video of the sites listed at the bottom of this page and then click this icon above:

langKey_helptoggle.message: Click the background to show the Top Links again

langKey_helpdrag.message: To move a Top Link, just click on it and move it the position you want

langKey_bordercolor.message: Select color of the border below

langKey_sync.message: Synchronize Top Links with your Google account
